augment.backpacked.farmhand.desc: Harvesting a fully-grown crop replants a matching seed from the backpack.
augment.backpacked.funnelling.desc:
Funnels picked up items into the backpack instead of the inventory.
A filter can be applied to only allow specific items.
If the backpack is full or an item is not allowed, it will be placed into the inventory as normal.
augment.backpacked.funnelling.mode.allow: Only items that are activated in the list will be funnelled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.funnelling.mode.disal: All items except the items that are activated in the list will be funnelled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.hopper_bridge.desc:
Allows hoppers to insert and extract items from the players worn backpack.
The player must stand either on top or in front the exit of the hopper.
Filters can be applied to limit insertable and extractable items
augment.backpacked.hopper_bridge.extract: When enabled, allows hoppers to extract items from the backpack.
augment.backpacked.hopper_bridge.filter_: Only selected items can be inserted and extracted
Only selected items can be extracted, however any item can be inserted
Only selected items can be inserted, however any item can be extracted
All items may be both inserted and extracted
The filter mode determines when to check selected items
When enabled, allows hoppers to insert items into the backpack.
augment.backpacked.imbued_hide.desc: Strengthens the material of the backpack and makes it immune to fire damage
augment.backpacked.immortal.desc:
Totems of Undying stored in the backpack will be activated on death.
Totems held in the main and offhand will be used before ones located in the backpack.
augment.backpacked.lightweaver.desc:
Automatically places torches from the backpack at the players feet.
A minimum light level can be configured to prevent over placing.
Any type of torch will be placed, but can be toggled.
augment.backpacked.lightweaver.light_lev: The light level that must be reached before placing a torch. The higher the number, the more frequent a torch will be placed.
augment.backpacked.lightweaver.place_sou: Determines whether a sound should play when placing a torch
augment.backpacked.lootbound.blocks.tool: When enabled, drops from blocks will be pulled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.lootbound.desc:
A companion augment for Funnelling that enhances item harvesting.
Items dropped by mining blocks and killing mobs will pulled into the backpack from a distance.
Filters from Funnelling determine if an item will be pulled.
augment.backpacked.lootbound.mobs.toolti: When enabled, drops from mobs will be pulled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.desc:
Allows projectile weapons to pull ammunition from the backpack.
Can be configured to prioritise backpack or inventory.
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.priority.b: The backpack will be searched first
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.priority.i: The players inventory will be searched first
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.priority.t: Determines which inventory to search first when locating ammunition
augment.backpacked.recall.desc:
Upon death, the backpack returns to the assigned Backpack Shelf.
If the Backpack Shelf is occupied, the backpack will be put into a queue.
If a Backpack Shelf is not linked or it doesn't exist, the backpack will drop on death as normal.
augment.backpacked.recall.link_shelf.too: Player must be looking at a Backpack Shelf
augment.backpacked.reforge.desc:
Repairs damaged items inside the backpack upon picking up experience orbs.
Only repairs items enchanted with Mending.
Items are repaired collectively, rather than one at a time.
augment.backpacked.seedflow.desc:
Sprinkles crop seeds from the backpack onto empty farmland around the player.
A filter be configured to plant only specific seeds.
May also be set up to plant random seeds.
augment.backpacked.seedflow.randomize_se: When enabled, a random seed from the backpack will be planted instead of the first available. Handpicked Mode will affect the random selection.
When enabled, only allows the selected seeds to be planted.
backpack.backpacked.bamboo_basket.unlock: Feed a Panda in a Bamboo Jungle a piece of Bamboo to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.cardboard_box.unlock: Chop 100 Logs to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.cogwheel.unlock: Craft 10 Small or Large Cogwheel from Create to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.end_crystal.unlock: Kill the Ender Dragon to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.honey_jar.unlock: Obtain a Honey Bottle from a Beehive or Bee Nest to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.mini_chest.unlock: Find an unopened Buried Treasure Chest to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.piglin_pack.unlock: Barter with a Piglin 5 times by handing them a Gold Ingot to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.rocket.unlock: Fly over 1000 blocks with an Elytra to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.sheep_plush.unlock: Shear wool off a Sheep 10 times to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.trash_can.unlock: Obtain Bonemeal from a Composter 10 times to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.turtle_shell.unlock: Breed two Turtles together to unlock this backpack
backpack.backpacked.wandering_bag.unlock: Trade with a Wandering Trader to unlock this backpack
backpacked.gui.cosmetic_warning: Only the first equipped backpack's customizations are shown on the player
backpacked.tooltip.remove_items: You must empty the backpack before you can remove it or you can instead place it on a shelf
message.backpacked.occupied_back_slot: Back slot is occupied by another item
message.backpacked.player_opened: A player has opened your backpack
